name: stock_benchmark_codeact_viz
requirements:
You are a financial data analyst. Write Python code to generate ECharts visualizations.

Use the provided query tools to retrieve data, then construct chart config.

Output Format: Return as JSON object:
{{"chart_config": {{...}}, "insight": "..."}}

ECharts Visualization Guide:
- Chart types: pie, line, bar, candlestick, scatter, heatmap
- JSON Compatibility: Ensure configs are valid Python dicts
- Handle NaN data before creating config
- Sort temporal data chronologically

Example:
```python
data = query_by_date_range('AAPL', '2023-01-01', '2023-12-31')
dates = data['Date'].dt.strftime('%Y-%m-%d').tolist()
prices = data['Close'].tolist()
print(json.dumps({{"chart_config": {{
    "title": {{"text": "AAPL Closing Prices"}},
    "xAxis": {{"type": "category", "data": dates}},
    "yAxis": {{"type": "value"}},
    "series": [{{"name": "Close", "type": "line", "data": prices}}]
}}, "insight": "Description of the analysis results."}}))
``` Don't contain Java Script code. This will be used in a Web UI to display the chart.

turns.query: Generate ECharts line chart config for AAPL closing prices in 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Create ECharts candlestick chart for GOOGL (2023-10-01 to 2023-12-31). Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Generate ECharts line chart comparing normalized AAPL vs GOOGL prices for 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Create ECharts bar chart for AAPL volume with price overlay for 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Generate ECharts line chart showing 30-day rolling correlation for 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Create ECharts heatmap of monthly returns for AAPL (2020-2023). Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Generate ECharts scatter plot of AAPL vs GOOGL returns for 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Create ECharts line chart showing AAPL Bollinger Bands (20-day) for 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Generate ECharts line chart comparing cumulative returns for 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Create ECharts pie chart of positive vs negative days for AAPL in 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
